/>
II.ii.2.B.4.e
.
Proper Handling of VA Form 21-4582
In order to ensure the contents of
VA Form 21-4582
remain protected, VA employees
are responsible for repairing or replacing the envelope if it gets damaged or becomes too worn to use, and
should
never
slit the sides or bottoms of the envelope to remove records.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Restricted Records Storage and Control
citation: Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
